attributes.action: scrap the life in the uk test for wives / spouses of british citizens .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recently introduced ' Life in the Uk Test ' for those applying for settlement rather than citizenship , is merely a revenue generating exercise . Most uk citizens cannot score above 50% , yet people from other countries are asked to get 75% plus to pass . They are then hit with exorbitant visa extension fees .
